information about nutrition for kidney disease is provided in the NIDDK health topics:
                
- Nutrition for Children with Chronic Kidney Disease  - Nutrition for Adults with Early Chronic Kidney Disease  - Nutrition for Adults with Advanced Chronic Kidney Disease
                
The National Kidney Disease Education Program offers a series of easy-to-read fact sheets about nutrition for people with CKD.",NIDDK,Polycystic Kidney Disease
